file.name: ArraysMan02Slicing
file.title: Slicing Arrays
file.bullet: The .slice method allows us to copy a portion of an array.
The slice method optionally takes two arguments to define where the portion we want starts and stops.
.slice will not modify the original array; it will return a new array.
The second argument is the index to stop at, that is, the array returned will have the elements up to, but not including, the stop index.

ul.li: Slice out 'Orange' and 'Apple' into another array.
